title: Battery Storage Augmentation Analysis
description: The owner of a 5-year-old solar farm is considering adding a battery storage system to the site.

tasks.description: Analyze the solar farm's historical generation profile and the amount of energy that is curtailed or sold at low prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent quantifies the volume of energy that could be stored and sold later.

tasks.description: Size an economically optimal battery system to capture this energy and participate in ancillary service markets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends a 4-hour duration battery with a specific MW rating.

tasks.description: Perform a financial analysis of the battery addition, calculating its IRR and NPV.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a complete financial case for the project.
